name: Drone Attack (ctrl-alt-caleb)
description:
Drone Attack is a 2D obstacle dodging game made with C# and Unity. 

<------------------------ Controls ------------------------>

WASD/Arrow Keys to move

Space to jump

L-Shift to teleport

<----------------------------------------------------------->

This is my first game so any feedback is appreciated, current high score is 83. 

-caleb 

(⌐■_■)

Artwork by OcO: https://oco.itch.io/
